result.arabic_text: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمۡ فَأَحۡسَنَ صُوَرَكُمۡۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
result.translation: Yaremye amajuru n’isi mu kuri (ata gufyina kurimwo), Iraheza Irabarema Ibaha n’ishusho ryiza ribabereye. Ni kuri Yo rero, ibiremwa vyose bizosubizwa ku musi w’iharurirwa, kugira Ihembe kimwe cose ku rugero rw’ibigikwiye.
